summary: A romantic drama centered around a young shepherd and shepherdess and the ramifications of their forbidden affair.
cast: Andy Gillet|Stéphanie Crayencour|Cécile Cassel|Véronique Reymond|Rosette|Jocelyn Quivrin|Mathilde Mosnier|Rodolphe Pauly|Serge Renko|Arthur Dupont|Priscilla Galland|Olivier Blond|Alexandre Everest|Fanny Vambacas|Caroline Blotière|Alain Libolt|Marie Rivière
title: El romance de Astrea y Celadón
